turn_on.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) turns on the LEDs.

*See also: [TM1651 Battery Display](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-turn-on-action)*

turn_off.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) turns off all the LEDs.

*See also: [TM1651 Battery Display](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-turn-off-action)*

level_percent.docs:

set_level_percent.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) changes the level of the battery display at runtime. Automatically calculates input level in percentages to actual level for the display.

*See also: [TM1651 Battery Display](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-set-level-percent-action)*

brightness.docs:
**[templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable), int**: There is three levels of brightness (`1`, `2` or `3`) from lowest to highest brightness.



*See also: [TM1651 Battery Display](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-set-brightness-action)*

set_brightness.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) allows you to manually change the brightness of the battery display at runtime.

*See also: [TM1651 Battery Display](https://esphome.io/components/tm1651.html#tm1651-set-brightness-action)*
